<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Pathfinder Hopeful](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=51)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

You’ve long wanted to join the adventurous Pathfinder Society. You have taken up the dangerous life of an adventurer in hopes of earning a spot among the Pathfinders.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) skill, and the [Pathfinder Society Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Additional Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=750) skill feat.
